name: Lilleborg AS
membership: Trade associations in Norway, Sweden, Denmark & Finland.
goal: Local, sustainable living, made easy. We develop, produce and market products for the home and personal care sector. Our main marked is the Nordic countries, but we have a presence globally.
interests: Consumers, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation, Trade
euInitiatives: We follow the work on the relevant legislation for our company: Cosmetics, Detergents, Biocides, including REACH, CLP etc.
